text:
TubularLabs (Sunnyvale, CA) - Analytics Engineers and General Engineers.

Key technologies: Storm, Python, Tornado.

About Tubular: We're building tools to help YouTube channel develop their audiance. What this means is that we're helping channels, programs and network increase their view base. We've recently closed a real series A round and have customers lined up to use our products.

Glad to provide more details via email - david@tubularlabs.com
